column5: Can anyone recommend a good place to rent a boat.  Either on Simcoe or Rice lake? or I guess any surrounding lakes.  Looking to rent on May 25th.  Thanks in advance.
Sturgeon Lake, Lindsay  Lunge Haven Cottages
3 OR 4 Rental joints in Bewdley on Rice ... Just drive down the main drag. One guy opens at 5am on weekends
bewdley tourist resort is pretty good.  I was there a few years ago, the guy running it is pretty cool, even helped us clean some of the walleye and crappie we caught.
